text: Sam is an exceptional host. His acts of kindness, truly defines what it means to be humble. His dwelling exudes perfection in Cleanliness. The ambiance is peaceful, luxury, & most inviting. The scenery of his penthouse's view is attractively ravishing. He and his residence is 5-STARS. Anyone who converses with him & stay at his penthouse will attain an experience.
title: Penthouse Couch Crash 9PM-9AM ONLY
